UnifiedTask.name: UnifiedTask
UnifiedTask.description: Represents a business activity such as a to-do item.

ActivityDateTime.description: The date and time of the activity in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.

DetailId.description: The ID of the object that contains detailed activity-specific information. The object depends on the activity type. For example, the detail for a Task activity is a Task object.

IsInsightAvailable.description: Indicates whether the activity has an insight associated with it (true) or not (false).

Snippet.description: An abbreviation of the task body or description. This field has a maximum length of 255 characters.

Subject.description: The subject line of the task.
